content:
API Documentation url:
https://developers.google.com/workspace/tasks/reference/rest

Google Tasks integrations


Action
Create a Task
Creates a new task.

Action
Google Tasks
Create a Task List
Creates a new task list.

Action
Google Tasks
Delete a Task
Deletes a task.

Action
Google Tasks
Delete a Task List
Deletes a task list.

Action
Google Tasks
Get a Task
Returns the data of a specified task.

Action
Google Tasks
Get a Task List
Returns the data of a specified task list.

Action
Google Tasks
Make an API Call
Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

Action
Google Tasks
Update a Task
Updates an existing task.

Action
Google Tasks
Update a Task List
Updates an existing task list.

Action
List Task Lists
Returns a list of all task lists.

Action
List Tasks
Returns a list of all tasks in the specified task list.

I am planning to build an integration component for tasks. Could you provide me with a list and description of the most commonly used and essential API endpoints for this service? Specifically, I am interested in endpoints related to core operations. For each endpoint, please include the HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE), the endpoint URL or path, link to documentation, a brief description of its purpose, provide list of inputs. If possible, also mention any authentication requirements.
Create the service json as well, (serviceJson property)
ignore input parameters for pagination, it could be for example page, offset, limit, etc.

Action naming conventions: Try to avoid naming with "List", such as "List Users", "List Contacts" etc. Use "Find" instead. For example "Find Users", "FInd Contacts". These actions have usually input parameters for search, such as "query", "search" or similar.

Provide information about authentication, include type of authentication, and other properties. Provide information about authentication endpoint URL, token URL for managing access token - for obtaining access token and refreshing access token. Provide information about profile info URL, where is possible to get information about current user. It is used for getting user profile information, such as email, name, etc. (authentication property)
